onsiteSupport.emergencyOnlyDefinition: Complete loss of operation for a branch or emergency room; otherwise onsite must be scheduled in advance.

allowedWorkExamples: Routine maintenance, patching, monitoring, and backup operations
User access management and password resets
Minor configuration updates to restore service
disallowedWorkExamples: New project work or transformational initiatives
Onsite support exceeding 48 hours per month without prior approval

triggers: Client requests project work without an approved SOW
Estimated effort exceeds 24 hours for incidents or 8 hours for service requests
Onsite effort needed beyond the 48 hours/month allocation
Pattern of out-of-scope or disputed scope requests

metadata.source: Altus Community Healthcare Managed Support Services SOW
